add_item_form.note: Your product will be added to the store after filling the required information.

faq.question_one_answer: There must be a deal between the customers and the sellers to determine how returning items should be and our staff is not responsible of it.
faq.question_two_answer: Sure! you can cancel your order within first 12 hours.
faq.question_three_title: What methods of payment you take?
faq.question_three_answer: You can pay online via credit card or pay at the door while dealing with the seller.
faq.question_four_title: How do I track my order?
faq.question_four_answer: You can have the phone number of the company which does the delivering and ask them where your order is.
faq.question_five_title: What is the policy for late/non-delivery of items ordered online?
faq.question_five_answer: Our customer service team will be there alwyas to resolve your issue, you can contact us.

features.description: Here at Dilmun we sell various products to customers and accept donations to help those people that are in need.
features.feature_one_description: Filter your items to find the right information.
features.feature_two_description: Use the website in your preferred language.
features.feature_three_description: Meet new people and make new connections.

hero.your_way: Your Way to Get Quality Products!

news_letter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter and stay updated

proof.what_they_say: What People are <br className='sm:block hidden' /> saying about us
proof.everything_you_need: Everything you need to know about our business and products anywhere on the planet.
proof.feedback_one_description: I've made multiple purchases and every single one has been great! The selection they offer is so varied I could spend hours looking through all the items.
proof.feedback_two_description: Every purchase felt secure and all items were received in a timely manner. What a great place to showcase products and goods of the business!
proof.feedback_three_description: I found that Dilmun was very professional and delivered a quality product in an efficient time frame. I would consider shopping with them again.
